conclusion: Understanding the velocity selector where ions pass through undeflected when magnetic and electric forces balance.

Deriving the charge-to-mass ratio of ions as q/m = v/rB.
Substituting velocity from the velocity selector to find q/m = E/rB^2.
Considering ions passing through apertures at points M and N in the magnetic analyzer.
